name: Phantump
author: Sumiyoshi Kizuki
flavor_text: According to old tales, these Pokémon are stumps possessed by the spirits of children who died while lost in the forest.

attacks.name: Ascension
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokémon and put it onto this Pokémon. (This counts as evolving this Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.
